name: GolmarG2Call+
0:
”Alexa, show the front door”
”Alexa, unlock the front door”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control Golmar cameras and video intercom equipment using your voice thanks to the G2Call+ skill for Alexa. The devices compatible with this skill are:

- Compatible Golmar G2Call+ cameras
- Golmar video intercom equipment compatible G2Call+ with support for Alexa.

To activate the skill you need to have a G2Call+ account.
Find the G2Call+ skill in the Alexa app and activate it.
Link the skill to your G2Call+ account using your G2Call+ account credentials.
Find your devices by asking Alexa to “Discover devices” or using the Alexa devices finder.
Once found, the video intercom will be ready to be controlled via Alexa.
When you receive a notification that a call has been made on the video door panel, or at any time, say "Alexa, show {device name (e.g. front door)}" to display the image coming from the device.
To open the door associated with the device, say “Alexa, unlock {device name (e.g. front door)}”. To prevent unauthorized openings, Alexa will ask you to say the opening code that you have defined in the G2Call+ app.
